\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*’\w s|strong="G2962"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w* resounded \w throughout|strong="G1722"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Greece; \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w more|strong="G2192"\w* \w than|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w*, \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w become|strong="G3361"\w* known \w far|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* wide; \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w say|strong="G2980"\w* \w another|strong="G5100"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w Indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* speaking \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w* themselves tell \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w reception|strong="G1529"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w gave|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w*, \w turning|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w became|strong="G3588"\w* servants \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,
